nodes.text: Ryshcate was a sweet, brown pastry/cake that originated from Corellia. It was used to mark special occasions and to remember the homeworld when Corellians were offworld. Mirax Terrik presented Corran Horn with a ryshcate as a peace offering after he was wounded on Talasea, beginning their courtship. One of the more well-known ingredients was quality Corellian whiskey, and it also contained vweilu nuts. Custo Ramak's famous deathbed work describing his life in Coronet City was entitled Nights of Ryscate and Diamonds.
